namuth sambandhan uthsahaya athahariye natha.ohu thama sagaya wu demala jathika sandhana manthi්ra ha nithignya em.ee sumanthiran ha ekwa nawatha nawathath wiganeshwaranwa dinaganimata uthsaha kaleya.shi්ralankawe menma wideshayanhi wasaya kala demala pa්rajawe pa්rabalayin lesa salakena pudgalayin kihipadenekma maha amathi apekshaka lesa idiripath wannayi wiganeshwarangen illa sitiyaha.awasana me siyalle pa්rathipalayak lesa maha amathi apekshaka lesa idiripath wimata wiganeshwaran kamaththa palakaleya.senathirajata me bawa danumdima siduwu athara ee asa ohu durmukha wu bawak penenta thibina.
